attributes.action: ·	A change in the Regulations so that in future all Overseas Trained Teachers are treated equally and in the same way as European Free Trade Area teachers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
·We the Overseas Trained teachers would like.	
An extension of time 
·	Review of position from the    government for overseas trained teacher. 
·	Favourable treatment/fairness
